image:image.image:title: SZABIST FinTech Certification - Opening Session
image:image.image:caption: Opening ceremony of the FinTech certification program at SZABIST. Industry experts and academic leaders launching the comprehensive financial technology training initiative.

image:image.image:title: FinTech Workshop - Blockchain & Cryptocurrency
image:image.image:caption: Hands-on workshop session covering blockchain technology and cryptocurrency applications in modern finance. Participants learning about decentralized finance and digital payment systems.

image:image.image:title: FinTech Certification - Graduation Ceremony
image:image.image:caption: Graduation ceremony celebrating successful completion of the FinTech certification program. Participants receiving their certificates and joining the growing community of fintech professionals.

image:image.image:title: NuTech Job Fair 2025 - Opening Ceremony
image:image.image:caption: The grand opening of NuTech Job Fair 2025, showcasing the latest opportunities in technology and innovation. Industry leaders and students gathering for networking and career opportunities.

image:image.image:title: Big0 Booth at NuTech Job Fair
image:image.image:caption: Big0's impressive booth display at the NuTech Job Fair, highlighting our AI and machine learning solutions. Team members engaging with potential candidates and showcasing our innovative projects.

image:image.image:title: Tech Demo Presentations
image:image.image:caption: Live demonstrations of cutting-edge technology solutions at the job fair. Companies presenting their latest innovations and technical capabilities to prospective employees and partners.
